title: The 25 Best Swimsuits From Amazon For Your Next Getaway
description: No doubt, you’ll want to stock up.
excerpt: From one-pieces to checkered bikinis, here are the best swimsuits from Amazon worth buying. Click to shop for the best swimwear from the online retail giant.
text: Best Cutout One-PieceCUPSHE Candy Rain One Shoulder One-Piece SwimsuitAmazon’s bestselling swimsuit brand, Cupshe, boasts a slew of ultra-flattering swimsuits that come with an equally as gorgeous (read: affordable) price tag. Sizes: XXS-XL Colors: Coffee, RedMaterial: 91% nylon, 9% spandexCustomer review: “This swimsuit is so cute!! The cut on the side is perfect without being too revealing. Awesome for this mom who wants to feel good in a swimsuit again!”Best Ribbed Knit BikiniZAFUL Ribbed O-Ring String Bikini ProsRemovable padded cupsConsMay not be ideal for bustier womenThe ring detailing on this ribbed number turns this low-key style up a notch.Sizes: S-XL Colors: 39 optionsMaterial: 85% polyester, 15% spandexCustomer review: “The swimsuit is just like the picture! The material is actually thicker than I expected, but not in a bad way—rather, in a way that makes it more quality. I like the cheeky fit of the bottoms and the ties are true ties not pre-knotted. Well worth the purchase!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest One-Shoulder Bikini YIMISAN Ribbed One-Shoulder Bikini ProsGood quality for priceReviewers love how comfortable this ribbed bikini is. Plus, we appreciate its sporty silhouette, affordable price tag, and the fact that it comes in tons of fun, bright colors. Go ahead and pick up a few sets to mix and match pieces. Sizes: XS-XL Colors: 27 optionsMaterial: 82% polyamide, 18% elastaneCustomer review: “I am obsessedddddd with this. I bought the red one for a vacation to St. Thomas and I got so many compliments at the beach. Seriously my favorite swimsuit!!”Best Sporty BikiniL*Space Ace Bikini Top Sporty and seam-free, this square-neck top is great for those who want a little more coverage with maximum comfort. The high-contrast white trim is definitely eye-catching. Sizes: XS-XLColors: Black and Cream, Tiki TikiMaterial: 80% nylon, 20% spandex Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest V-Neck One-PieceCUPSHE V-Neck One Piece Swimsuit ConsSome may wish it had more paddingAll this suit is missing is a linen cover-up, an oversized straw hat, and an ice-cold beverage in hand. Thanks to its soft ribbed knit finish and cute lace-up details, this one also doubles as a sexy bodysuit for a night out. Sizes: XS-XXL Colors: 10 optionsMaterial: 91% nylon, 9% spandexCustomer review: “I purchased this for my honeymoon, and I cannot wait to wear it. It is true to size. I am pretty curvy, but it is very flattering. The quality is great, too. I am very happy with this.”Best Belted One-PieceBeach Riot Sydney One Piece ProsRemovable pads offer customizable supportConsA built-in belt on this sleek number means you don’t have to overthink your seaside accessories. Other subtle details like ribbed fabric and dainty ties at the shoulders also zhuzh up this staple black suit. Might we suggest a crisscross across your waist?Sizes: XL Plus-4XL PlusColors: 34 optionsMaterial: Nylon/spandex, polyester blend lining Customer review: “Honestly this swimsuit is a great buy for my plus-size girls. I felt good and confident in this swimsuit. It was comfortable. I weigh about 243 pounds and ordered a size 3XL and it was perfect. I got so many compliments on it. I would buy it in more colors.”Best Bikini for Small BustsSherryDC Solid Scoop Neck Bikini Swimsuit Craving a little extra boost? This cheeky set with a plunging scoop neck should help give you some natural-looking lift. Plus, your fresh tan will look amazing against this fun Barbie-pink hue.Sizes: S-XL Colors: 25 optionsMaterial: 82% nylon, 18% spandexCustomer review: “Really liked this suit! I have an athletic build with a nonexistent chest. This top is on the tighter side and pulls everything in to make it look like I actually have something.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Bandeau BikiniZAFUL Bandeau Strapless O Ring BikiniConsMay not be the best option for those with bigger bustsLook no further if you’re searching for a suit to minimize the appearance of tan lines. Just in case you do want straps, this one comes with a set. The fabric was thick as well."Best Zip-Front One-PieceMagicSuit Scuba High Neck Racerback Zip One PieceProsAdjustable front zipperIf you’re feeling a little sporty and flirty, try this scuba zip-up one-piece by MagicSuit. Customers say the suit dries easily and fits like a glove.Sizes: 8-16Colors: 6 optionsMaterials: 72% Nylon and 28% LYCRA® SpandexCustomer review: “Love the color! This suit is perfect! Beautiful fabric, with just the right amount of coverage and good support. Love it!”Best Plus-Size Bikini SetAqua Eve 3 Piece Bikini Set SwimsuitWhat’s better than a bundle for the price of one? This set comes with an all-black bikini and is complete with a sheer, plunging cover-up to show off the chic bikini underneath so you’ll look polished even while sitting poolside. Sizes: S-28 PlusColors: 9 optionsMaterials:82% Nylon, 18% spandexCustomer review: “I loved the fit and look of this set. I've never been fully confident with wearing bikinis but I put this on and had a whole moment. The wrap just adds the perfect amount of coverup and the bikini is well made and fits me perfectly.I definitely recommend!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Reversible Swimsuit HIDRUO Floral One Piece Square Neck Reversible SwimsuitConsMay not offer chest supportThe only thing better than one cute patterned swimsuit is two! You’ll feel (and look!) like you have on an entirely different bathing suit in this reversible number. Throw on a pair of light-wash denim shorts for a last-minute outfit. Customers rave about how easily it can be worn as a bodysuit.Sizes: S-XLColors: Blue, Green, PinkMaterials: 85% Polyester, 15% SpandexCustomer review: “This swimsuit is so versatile. It can be worn as a casual beach style with added jean shorts or a skirt or as a swimsuit all on its own. It's comfortable and cute.”Best Plus-Size Swimsuit Daci Plus Size One Piece Swimsuit This suit proves that simple can be stunning. If you’re looking for more coverage on the bottom, this one-piece offers more of a brief style cut while still showcasing a low back for a chic minimalist look. Sizes: Medium-30 PlusColors: 22 optionsMaterials: 82% Nylon, 18% SpandexCustomer review: “This is by far my favorite swimsuit of my adult life. It provides sufficient coverage where I want coverage, does a nice job of smoothing where I was things to be smooth, and still manages to be cute and comfortable. Highly recommend.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest High Waist Ruffle Bikini SPORLIKE High Waisted Swimsuit Ruffle Bikini This ruffled, high-waist bikini is a fun take on an all-black suit and feels dressier than your everyday black triangle version in case you have a pool party to attend. Plus, the straps are adjustable, so you’ll feel snug and secure all day. Sizes: S-XL Colors: 19 optionsMaterials: 82% Polyester, 18% spandexCustomer review:“I wore this to the beach and got SO many compliments! It has great coverage and is super comfortable! It fit super TTS!”Best Underwire One-PieceSolid & Striped The Veronica One PieceProsRetro-inspired designSolid & Striped has been re-imagining the one-piece since 2014. For the latest take, check out this bustier-style corset option.Sizes: XS-XLColors: Cream, BlackMaterial: Recycled polyamide, elastaneCustomer review: “Have it in three colors. Beautiful shape. Flattering. Get so many compliments.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Cutout Two-PieceMOOSLOVER One Shoulder High Waisted Bikini Tie High Heat things up in this cherry red two-piece, which has a subtle cutout detail that ties on the side. The one shoulder feels like a little nod to the early aughts without feeling like too much of a throwback.Sizes: S-XLColors: 22 optionsMaterial: Polyester, spandexCustomer review: "The comfort is unmatched. The fabric is incredibly soft against my skin, making it a joy to wear all day at the beach or by the pool. The fit is also spot on—it's both comfortable and flattering, accentuating all the right places without feeling too tight or restrictive."Best High-Cut Lap SuitBlooming Jelly One Piece Swimsuit Sporty Ribbed ConsMay not be offer enough support for those with bigger bustsHigh-contrast piping gives this one-piece, a cool, sporty look that mimics an old-school ringer tee with plenty of coverage for those days at the beach when you want something comfy and cute.Sizes: S-XLColors: 11 optionsMaterial: Polyester, spandexCustomer review: "This swimsuit has a nice thick material and full chest coverage. Nice thick straps for bigger bust support. It's slightly cheeky but still pretty modest. I even wore it out shopping with shorts for the tucked-in tank top look."Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Floral Front-TieBERLOOK Tie Floral One-Piece Bathing SuitConsMake not fit the best for those who are petite This toile-inspired one-piece is the swimsuit equivalent of a sundress with the iconic pattern. Toss on a skirt after your dip in the pool for a quick dinner-ready outfit.Sizes: S-2XLColors: 15 optionsMaterial: Recycled Polyamide, ElastaneCustomer review: "Very impressed with the quality of this swim suit! Worn at the beach and in pools, washed many times and color and fabric is still like brand new! I am a 36D with wide hips, so ordered XL, however the cup is almost too large, but it fits so comfortably everywhere else I just tighter the strings on the breast area and I don’t feel like I will fall out. 100% would buy again in another design."Best Cross Strap SuitCUPSHE Deep V Neck Cutout Criss Cross SuitProsOffers great tummy supportConsSome reviews say it runs smallThe next time you go to a pool party, make a statement in this criss-cross suit—which boasts over 2,000 five-star reviews, so you know it’s great. The adjustable straps allow you to move the bust for more or less coverage.Sizes: XS-2XLColors: 10 optionsMaterial: 80% Chinlon, 20%SpandexCustomer review: “I am petite (5ft, typically size 2), so it can be difficult finding one piece that fit length-wise. This fit great, and was super cute. Exactly what I was looking for, for an upcoming tropical vacation. Love the adjustable straps and that the top can be more coverage or less coverage!”
html:
Best Cutout One-Piece

CUPSHE Candy Rain One Shoulder One-Piece Swimsuit

Amazon’s bestselling swimsuit brand, Cupshe, boasts a slew of ultra-flattering swimsuits that come with an equally as gorgeous (read: affordable) price tag.

Sizes: XXS-XL

Colors: Coffee, Red

Material: 91% nylon, 9% spandex

Customer review: “This swimsuit is so cute!! The cut on the side is perfect without being too revealing. Awesome for this mom who wants to feel good in a swimsuit again!”

Best Ribbed Knit Bikini

ZAFUL Ribbed O-Ring String Bikini

Pros
  • Removable padded cups
Cons
  • May not be ideal for bustier women

The ring detailing on this ribbed number turns this low-key style up a notch.

Sizes: S-XL

Colors: 39 options

Material: 85% polyester, 15% spandex

Customer review: “The swimsuit is just like the picture! The material is actually thicker than I expected, but not in a bad way—rather, in a way that makes it more quality. I like the cheeky fit of the bottoms and the ties are true ties not pre-knotted. Well worth the purchase!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best One-Shoulder Bikini

YIMISAN Ribbed One-Shoulder Bikini

Pros
  • Good quality for price

Reviewers love how comfortable this ribbed bikini is. Plus, we appreciate its sporty silhouette, affordable price tag, and the fact that it comes in tons of fun, bright colors. Go ahead and pick up a few sets to mix and match pieces.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: 27 options

Material: 82% polyamide, 18% elastane

Customer review: “I am obsessedddddd with this. I bought the red one for a vacation to St. Thomas and I got so many compliments at the beach. Seriously my favorite swimsuit!!”

Best Sporty Bikini

L*Space Ace Bikini Top

Sporty and seam-free, this square-neck top is great for those who want a little more coverage with maximum comfort. The high-contrast white trim is definitely eye-catching.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Black and Cream, Tiki Tiki

Material: 80% nylon, 20% spandex

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best V-Neck One-Piece

CUPSHE V-Neck One Piece Swimsuit

Cons
  • Some may wish it had more padding

All this suit is missing is a linen cover-up, an oversized straw hat, and an ice-cold beverage in hand. Thanks to its soft ribbed knit finish and cute lace-up details, this one also doubles as a sexy bodysuit for a night out.

Sizes: XS-XXL

Colors: 10 options

Material: 91% nylon, 9% spandex

Customer review: “I purchased this for my honeymoon, and I cannot wait to wear it. It is true to size. I am pretty curvy, but it is very flattering. The quality is great, too. I am very happy with this.”

Best Belted One-Piece

Beach Riot Sydney One Piece

Pros
  • Removable pads offer customizable support
Cons

    A built-in belt on this sleek number means you don’t have to overthink your seaside accessories. Other subtle details like ribbed fabric and dainty ties at the shoulders also zhuzh up this staple black suit.

    Sizes: XS-L

    Colors: Black, White

    Material: 82% polyester, 18% spandex

    Customer review: “A bit pricey—but super classy.”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    Best High-Waisted Plus-Size Bikini

    Sovoyontee High Waisted Swimsuit Set

    The customizable waist tie on this two-piece set can make this bikini feel brand new with just a couple of knots. Might we suggest a crisscross across your waist?

    Sizes: XL Plus-4XL Plus

    Colors: 34 options

    Material: Nylon/spandex, polyester blend lining

    Customer review: “Honestly this swimsuit is a great buy for my plus-size girls. I felt good and confident in this swimsuit. It was comfortable. I weigh about 243 pounds and ordered a size 3XL and it was perfect. I got so many compliments on it. I would buy it in more colors.”

    Best Bikini for Small Busts

    SherryDC Solid Scoop Neck Bikini Swimsuit

    Craving a little extra boost? This cheeky set with a plunging scoop neck should help give you some natural-looking lift. Plus, your fresh tan will look amazing against this fun Barbie-pink hue.

    Sizes: S-XL

    Colors: 25 options

    Material: 82% nylon, 18% spandex

    Customer review: “Really liked this suit! I have an athletic build with a nonexistent chest. This top is on the tighter side and pulls everything in to make it look like I actually have something.”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    Best Bandeau Bikini

    ZAFUL Bandeau Strapless O Ring Bikini

    Cons
    • May not be the best option for those with bigger busts

    Look no further if you’re searching for a suit to minimize the appearance of tan lines. Just in case you do want straps, this one comes with a set.

    Sizes: S-XL

    Colors: 7 options

    Material: 82% nylon, 18% spandex

    Customer review: "I ordered this swimsuit very last minute, it fit very well and was very supportive of the girls. The fabric was thick as well."

    Best Zip-Front One-Piece

    MagicSuit Scuba High Neck Racerback Zip One Piece

    Pros
    • Adjustable front zipper

    If you’re feeling a little sporty and flirty, try this scuba zip-up one-piece by MagicSuit. Customers say the suit dries easily and fits like a glove.

    Sizes: 8-16

    Colors: 6 options

    Materials: 72% Nylon and 28% LYCRA® Spandex

    Customer review: “Love the color! This swimsuit is very comfortable and the adjustable zipper allows you to control the look.”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    Best Minimalist One-Piece

    Tempt Me High Cut One Piece Swimsuit

    Pros
    • Great for those with a longer torso
    Cons
    • Some may wish the back had more coverage

    You can never go wrong with a little black suit; it’s the equivalent of a little black dress and is always appropriate, no matter the occasion.

    Sizes: XS-22 Plus

    Colors: 9 options

    Materials: 82% Nylon, 18% Spandex

    Customer review: “Been looking for a suit forever, and every single one I order with high hopes ends up disappointing. This suit is perfect! Beautiful fabric, with just the right amount of coverage and good support. Love it!”

    Best Plus-Size Bikini Set

    Aqua Eve 3 Piece Bikini Set Swimsuit

    What’s better than a bundle for the price of one? This set comes with an all-black bikini and is complete with a sheer, plunging cover-up to show off the chic bikini underneath so you’ll look polished even while sitting poolside.

    Sizes: S-28 Plus

    Colors: 9 options

    Materials:82% Nylon, 18% spandex

    Customer review: “I loved the fit and look of this set. I've never been fully confident with wearing bikinis but I put this on and had a whole moment. The wrap just adds the perfect amount of coverup and the bikini is well made and fits me perfectly.I definitely recommend!”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    Best Reversible Swimsuit

    HIDRUO Floral One Piece Square Neck Reversible Swimsuit

    Cons
    • May not offer chest support

    The only thing better than one cute patterned swimsuit is two! You’ll feel (and look!) like you have on an entirely different bathing suit in this reversible number. Throw on a pair of light-wash denim shorts for a last-minute outfit. Customers rave about how easily it can be worn as a bodysuit.

    Sizes: S-XL

    Colors: Blue, Green, Pink

    Materials: 85% Polyester, 15% Spandex

    Customer review: “This swimsuit is so versatile. It can be worn as a casual beach style with added jean shorts or a skirt or as a swimsuit all on its own. It's comfortable and cute.”

    Best Plus-Size Swimsuit

    Daci Plus Size One Piece Swimsuit

    This suit proves that simple can be stunning. If you’re looking for more coverage on the bottom, this one-piece offers more of a brief style cut while still showcasing a low back for a chic minimalist look.

    Sizes: Medium-30 Plus

    Colors: 22 options

    Materials: 82% Nylon, 18% Spandex

    Customer review: “This is by far my favorite swimsuit of my adult life. It provides sufficient coverage where I want coverage, does a nice job of smoothing where I was things to be smooth, and still manages to be cute and comfortable. Highly recommend.”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    Best High Waist Ruffle Bikini

    SPORLIKE High Waisted Swimsuit Ruffle Bikini

    This ruffled, high-waist bikini is a fun take on an all-black suit and feels dressier than your everyday black triangle version in case you have a pool party to attend. Plus, the straps are adjustable, so you’ll feel snug and secure all day.

    Sizes: S-XL

    Colors: 19 options

    Materials: 82% Polyester, 18% spandex

    Customer review:“I wore this to the beach and got SO many compliments! It has great coverage and is super comfortable! It fit super TTS!”

    Best Underwire One-Piece

    Solid & Striped The Veronica One Piece

    Pros
    • Retro-inspired design

    Solid & Striped has been re-imagining the one-piece since 2014. For the latest take, check out this bustier-style corset option.

    Sizes: XS-XL

    Colors: Cream, Black

    Material: Recycled polyamide, elastane

    Customer review: “Have it in three colors. Beautiful shape. Flattering. Get so many compliments.”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    Best Cutout Two-Piece

    MOOSLOVER One Shoulder High Waisted Bikini Tie High

    Heat things up in this cherry red two-piece, which has a subtle cutout detail that ties on the side. The one shoulder feels like a little nod to the early aughts without feeling like too much of a throwback.

    Sizes: S-XL

    Colors: 22 options

    Material: Polyester, spandex

    Customer review: "The comfort is unmatched. The fabric is incredibly soft against my skin, making it a joy to wear all day at the beach or by the pool. The fit is also spot on—it's both comfortable and flattering, accentuating all the right places without feeling too tight or restrictive."

    Best High-Cut Lap Suit

    Blooming Jelly One Piece Swimsuit Sporty Ribbed

    Cons
    • May not be offer enough support for those with bigger busts

    High-contrast piping gives this one-piece, a cool, sporty look that mimics an old-school ringer tee with plenty of coverage for those days at the beach when you want something comfy and cute.

    Sizes: S-XL

    Colors: 11 options

    Material: Polyester, spandex

    Customer review: "This swimsuit has a nice thick material and full chest coverage. Nice thick straps for bigger bust support. It's slightly cheeky but still pretty modest. I even wore it out shopping with shorts for the tucked-in tank top look."

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    Best Floral Front-Tie

    BERLOOK Tie Floral One-Piece Bathing Suit

    Cons
    • Make not fit the best for those who are petite

    This toile-inspired one-piece is the swimsuit equivalent of a sundress with the iconic pattern. Toss on a skirt after your dip in the pool for a quick dinner-ready outfit.

    Sizes: S-2XL

    Colors: 15 options

    Material: Recycled Polyamide, Elastane

    Customer review: "Very impressed with the quality of this swim suit! Worn at the beach and in pools, washed many times and color and fabric is still like brand new! I am a 36D with wide hips, so ordered XL, however the cup is almost too large, but it fits so comfortably everywhere else I just tighter the strings on the breast area and I don’t feel like I will fall out. 100% would buy again in another design."

    Best Cross Strap Suit

    CUPSHE Deep V Neck Cutout Criss Cross Suit

    Pros
    • Offers great tummy support
    Cons
    • Some reviews say it runs small

    The next time you go to a pool party, make a statement in this criss-cross suit—which boasts over 2,000 five-star reviews, so you know it’s great. The adjustable straps allow you to move the bust for more or less coverage.

    Sizes: XS-2XL

    Colors: 10 options

    Material: 80% Chinlon, 20%Spandex

    Customer review: “I am petite (5ft, typically size 2), so it can be difficult finding one piece that fit length-wise. This fit great, and was super cute. Exactly what I was looking for, for an upcoming tropical vacation. Love the adjustable straps and that the top can be more coverage or less coverage!”
